tools.name: get_income_statements
tools.description:
Get income statements for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL, now in the test mode, you can use 'AAPL' or 'GOOGL')
        period: Period of the income statement (e.g. annual, quarterly, ttm)
        limit: Number of income statements to return (default: 4)

tools.name: get_balance_sheets
tools.description:
Get balance sheets for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)
        period: Period of the balance sheet (e.g. annual, quarterly, ttm)
        limit: Number of balance sheets to return (default: 4)

tools.name: get_cash_flow_statements
tools.description:
Get cash flow statements for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)
        period: Period of the cash flow statement (e.g. annual, quarterly, ttm)
        limit: Number of cash flow statements to return (default: 4)

tools.name: get_current_stock_price
tools.description:
Get the current / latest price of a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)

tools.name: get_historical_stock_prices
tools.description:
Gets historical stock prices for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)
        start_date: Start date of the price data (e.g. 2020-01-01)
        end_date: End date of the price data (e.g. 2020-12-31)
        interval: Interval of the price data (e.g. minute, hour, day, week, month)
        interval_multiplier: Multiplier of the interval (e.g. 1, 2, 3)

tools.name: get_company_news
tools.description:
Get news for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)

tools.name: get_crypto_prices
tools.description: Gets historical prices for a crypto currency.

tools.name: get_historical_crypto_prices
tools.description:
Gets historical prices for a crypto currency.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the crypto currency (e.g. BTC-USD). The list of available crypto tickers can be retrieved via the get_available_crypto_tickers tool.
        start_date: Start date of the price data (e.g. 2020-01-01)
        end_date: End date of the price data (e.g. 2020-12-31)
        interval: Interval of the price data (e.g. minute, hour, day, week, month)
        interval_multiplier: Multiplier of the interval (e.g. 1, 2, 3)

tools.name: get_current_crypto_price
tools.description:
Get the current / latest price of a crypto currency.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the crypto currency (e.g. BTC-USD). The list of available crypto tickers can be retrieved via the get_available_crypto_tickers tool.

tools.name: get_sec_filings
tools.description:
Get all SEC filings for a company.

    Args:
        ticker: Ticker symbol of the company (e.g. AAPL, GOOGL)
        limit: Number of SEC filings to return (default: 10)
        filing_type: Type of SEC filing (e.g. 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K)

get_available_crypto_tickers.purpose: 验证在不提供任何参数的情况下，工具能否正确返回所有可用的加密货币 ticker 列表。
验证当系统中没有任何加密货币数据时，工具是否能返回空列表或合理响应。
验证工具在接收到意外参数时是否会正确处理并返回错误信息（如果适用）。
验证工具是否对非法参数注入有防御能力，例如尝试注入脚本或特殊字符。

get_current_crypto_price.purpose: 验证使用有效的加密货币 ticker 参数时，工具是否能正确返回当前价格。
验证使用另一个有效的加密货币 ticker 参数时，工具是否能正确返回当前价格。

response.result: Unable to fetch current price or no current price found.

get_current_crypto_price.purpose: 验证工具是否支持多个 ticker 请求（如果适用）或是否在仅支持单个 ticker 时做出正确响应。
